<h3 id="X31436">X(31436) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {BEVAN, INCIRCLE, STEINER}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*a^4+3*(b+c)*a^3-(5*b^2+18*b*c+5*c^2)*a^2-3*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<p>X(31436) lies on these lines:
